vecUnachieved.strDescription: Kill 2 enemies with a single bullet in Single Player or Special Ops.
Kill at least 3 enemies with a single shot from a grenade launcher in Single Player or Special Ops.
Infiltrate the snowy mountain side base.
Get hand picked for Shepherd's elite squad.
Kill at least 10 enemies with one Predator missile in Single Player or Special Ops.
Kill 6 enemies in a row using a thermal weapon in Single Player or Special Ops.
Kill 2 rappelling enemies in a row before they land on their feet in Single Player or Special Ops.

data: [["FIRST_DAY_OF_SCHOOL",{"strName":"First Day of School","strDescription":"Complete 'S.S.D.D.' and 'Team Player' on Veteran Difficulty.","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/10180/00358acc4ce4a3efc986c2f29fe976a4ee810ba0.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":12.300000190734863}],["BLACK_DIAMOND",{"strName":"Black Diamond","strDescription":"Complete 'Cliffhanger' on Veteran Difficulty.","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/10180/2b262d371d326d8fff38988a0309cf2a33eb3bda.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":13.699999809265137}]]

data.strFullDescription:
The most-anticipated game of the year and the sequel to the best-selling first-person action game of all time, Modern Warfare 2 continues the gripping and heart-racing action as players face off against a new threat dedicated to bringing the world to the brink of collapse. 
					Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare 2 features for the first time in video games, the musical soundtrack of legendary Academy Award®, Golden Globe® Award, Grammy® Award and Tony winning composer Hans Zimmer.  The title picks up immediately following the historic events of Call of Duty® 4: Modern Warfare®, the blockbuster title that earned worldwide critical acclaim, including:
					[list][*]"Most Played Online Video Game" in history, 2009 Guinness World Records
					[*]More than 50 Game of the Year awards, including the Console Game of the Year and Overall Game of the Year, 2007, from the Academy of Interactive Arts & Sciences®
					[/list][h2]SPECIAL OPS CO-OPERATIVE[/h2]
					An entirely new gameplay mode which supports 2-player co-operative play online that is unique from the single player story campaign.  
					[list][*]Special Ops pits players into a gauntlet of time-trial and objective-based missions.
					[*]Rank-up as players unlock new Special Ops missions, each more difficult.
					[*]Missions include highlights from the single player campaign, fan favorites from Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare and all new, exclusive missions.
					[/list][h2]MULTIPLAYER REINVENTED[/h2]
					Setting a new bar for online multiplayer, Modern Warfare 2 multiplayer delivers new capabilities, customization, gamestates and modes, including:
					Create-a-Class Evolved
					[list][*][b]Secondary Weapons[/b] - Machine Pistols, Shotguns, Handguns, Launchers
					[*][b]Riot Shields[/b]
					[*][b]Equipment[/b] - Throwing Knives, Blast Shield, Tactical Insertion
					[*][b]Perk Upgrades[/b]
					[*][b]Bling (Dual Attachments)[/b]
					[/list][list][*][b]Customizable Killstreaks[/b] - AC130, Sentry Gun, Predator Missile, Counter-UAV, Care Package
					[*][b]Accolades (Post match reports)[/b]
					[/list]
data.strSnippet: The most-anticipated game of the year and the sequel to the best-selling first-person action game of all time, Modern Warfare 2 continues the gripping and heart-racing action as players face off against a new threat dedicated to bringing the world to the brink of collapse.
